**The Supreme Cavern-Perfected Azure Essentials and Purple Writ of the Golden Root: A Compendium of Scriptures**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Cavern-Perfected Azure Essentials and Purple Writ of the Golden Root: A Compendium of Scriptures*
**Author:** Unknown, approximately dated to the Eastern Jin dynasty. A foundational text of the early Shangqing (Highest Clarity) tradition. Two fascicles.
**Source Text:** *Daoist Canon of the Orthodox Tradition*, Zhengyi Section, First Division.

---

### *The Supreme Cavern-Perfected Azure Essentials and Purple Writ of the Golden Root: A Compendium of Scriptures, Fascicle One*
**Composed by the Most Exalted Azure Youth Lord**

The Azure Essentials Emperor is a disciple of the Primordial Yang Jade Emperor of the Nine Heavens. In the first year of the Central August Era, when the year stood in the Eastern Pivot and the heavens first proclaimed their radiance, he was born in the Jade Realm of the Boundless Heaven upon the Dark Mound, beneath the Seven Jeweled Forest of the Luminous Grove, by the shores of the Nine Domains. His transformation in accordance with the cosmic pattern occurred at dawn on the third day. His surname was Yao, and his personal name was styled Bokai.

Nine dragons flanked his sides, while seven-hued jade phoenixes shaded his form. Divine scales bore sacred mushrooms to nourish him with the dark essence, and celestial maidens exhaled their essence to behold his truth. Jade lads scattered blossoms to dispel impurity, and spirit consorts diffused incense to repel dust. He contained his breath in embryonic respiration.

His dharma was naturally resplendent, his cap adorned with the twelve celestial signs. His face radiated a golden countenance, his body bore numinous talismans, and his speech resonated with golden verses in seventy-two hues, illuminating the Jade Clarity. For three dawns, his splendor shone; the six *qi* aligned in harmony. Dark clouds and purple canopies arose in his chamber, while flying essences and streaming light illumined his courtyard. Abiding in solitary integrity, he nurtured his spirit in the sacred recesses. His bearing followed the cosmic order, rising and falling with the turning of the ages. He dwelled in the realm of luminous rosy clouds and roamed the wastes of the Jade Realm, wielding the strategies of the Primordial August Emperor, descending upon the mounds of the Nine Domains.

Wandering at ease, his gaze flowing freely, he traversed countless kalpas before returning to the cloud chambers of the pure retreat. There, purple clouds formed his dwelling, azure mists his city walls, yellow gold his halls, and white jade his couch. The five *qi* intertwined, high terraces connected by eaves, jade steps adorned with patterns, and phoenix towers opened on four sides. Golden lads attended him, jade maidens held his towels, and celestial immortals—over five thousand in number—arrayed themselves as his celestial guard. Feathered riders thronged like scales, dragons and tigers warded off evil, and pairs of divine beasts crouched in symmetry. The dark *qi* convened in nine assemblies, numinous winds stirred the mist, and fragrant incense ascended to the heavens. The void gave birth to jeweled palaces, and flowing essence radiated jade light, illuminating the Ten Heavens. In lofty seclusion, he alone expounded the sacred texts, consuming essence and swallowing *qi*, chewing upon the dark root. He ingested the returning white jade wine, the golden liquid flowing with essence, while jade forests blossomed. The sun and moon were his imperial springs, refining his bones and transmuting his marrow, his entire being attaining perfection.

At that time, the Primordial Yang Jade Emperor of the Nine Heavens rode a nine-phoenix flying chariot of azure mist, its wheels of jade and canopy of feathers. Accompanied by a thousand perfected ones from the Mulberry Grove and a retinue of ten thousand chariots and a hundred million riders, with thirty-six flying immortals in attendance, he descended to the Azure Court of the Radiant Heavens to visit the Azure Essentials Emperor.

Together, they ascended the capital of the Nine Elders’ Immortal Metropolis and entered the Ninefold Chambers. The Western Terrace’s Tortoise Mother was commanded to open the cloud-phoenix repository and the purple brocade satchel, from which she produced the Purple Writ of the True Oral Instructions and the Jade Fascicle, bestowing them upon the Azure Essentials Emperor.

Having completed his cultivation of the Dao, the Azure Essentials Emperor ascended to the Jade Clarity. The Most High Lord of the Great Dao conferred upon him a flying cloud feathered canopy, the flowing purple phoenix script, the golden true jade light of the Seven Primes’ divine tiger tally, the flowing gold fire bell, the azure essence jade seal, the nine-hued seamless seal, and a feathered skirt of pure azure, enabling him to soar through the Highest Clarity.

Thereupon, he commanded the myriad transformations of light, revolved the five dawns, summoned the moon through the void, and seized the sun to set its wheel in motion. His transformations penetrated the mysteries of separation and union, uniting with the perfected in numinosity. Liberating his form, he traversed countless myriad changes, ascending to the Three Primes to pay homage at the Jade Palace. He roamed the boundless, traversed the Nine Heavens of Yin and Luo, entered and exited the cavern portals, and forged pacts with the jade immortals. Gazing upward, he received the decrees of the Most High Primordial Perfected of the Supreme Origin, aligning with the *qi* and following the mandate. His position governed the imperial dawn, and he oversaw the myriad Dao, none of the immortals being beyond his purview. Below, he oversaw the mountain spirits and river sources of the Ten Heavens, the Five Peaks and Four Seas—none failed to submit to his authority.

Since then, he has soared through the Purple Void, his golden name inscribed in the Azure Palace. The Purple Writ cannot be glimpsed, nor the Golden Root heard.

"Azure Essentials" is an alternate title of the Purple Clarity Emperor. Having received the Purple Writ of the Jade Emperor’s wondrous oral instructions—all essentials of the scriptures—he concealed them above the Nine Heavens, inscribing the hidden texts of the Eight Assemblies.

The Jade Emperor commanded the Most High Attendant Perfected Lord of the Assembly of Immortals to compile and collate the precious catalog, uniting them into a compendium of scriptures. With purple brush, he transcribed the texts, binding them in golden orchid fascicles—all derived from the Dao of the Supreme August and the Primordial Ancient, compiled by the loftiest sages. Gathered into fascicles, they were transmitted to the Azure Essentials Emperor, who passed them to the Supreme Void August Primordial Numinous Lord of the Dao. The Lord of the Dao transmitted them to the High Numinous Cavern Radiance Lord of the Great Simplicity, who passed them to the Supreme August Lord of the Southern Culmen. The Supreme August Lord transmitted them to the Heavenly Emperor Lord, who passed them to the Heavenly Emperor Lord of the Supreme Tenuity. The Heavenly Emperor Lord transmitted them to the Posterior Sage Lord of the Nine Mysteries, who finally bestowed them upon the Most Exalted Azure Youth Lord, keeper of the registers in the Jeweled Palace.

Those with predestined affinity who encounter this text have surely been divinely chosen to open the celestial assembly and are destined to receive the immortal registers.

The Jade Emperor treasures and conceals these scriptures, forbidding their transmission to the world. Those who recklessly divulge them shall be denounced by the Nine Heavens as deceivers and reported to the Emperor Lord. The Most High shall dispatch the divine soldiers of the Five Emperors to punish their bodies, condemning them to death as lowly ghosts, filling the river sources. Their seven generations of ancestors shall suffer torment in the Water Bureau. Scholars must heed the regulations and guard these secrets with reverence.

If one possesses a golden skeleton and jade bones, their name inscribed in the imperial records, and gains access to this text, they must follow the mysterious regulations of the Nine Perfected, cultivate the dharma disciplines, and present offerings in accordance with the covenants: one golden dragon and one jade fish as tokens, a hundred feet of purple silk, and forty feet of azure damask. They shall seek out a master of the scriptures to receive transmission.

Master and disciple shall perform a seven-hundred-day retreat in mutual purification. According to the regulations, only after seven hundred years may one be deemed worthy of receiving the three transmissions. Those who fail to adhere to the scriptural precepts and lightly divulge the secret fascicles shall be consigned to the Bureau of Ghosts upon death, their seven generations of ancestors held accountable, and they shall never attain immortality.

Those who cultivate the Dao of the Supreme Perfection must recite the *Yellow Court Jade Radiance* ten thousand times as the foundation, penetrate the Three Palaces, and open the obscure barriers—only then may they practice the methods of the *Purple Script Jade Formulas* and summon the true and invoke the numinous, ascending to the Mystery in broad daylight. The *Purple Script Formula* states: Those who cultivate the Dao of the Supreme Perfection must practice the *Shangqing Jade Rosy Clouds Purple Illumination Inner Vision* method.

Regularly on the first day of the upper decade of one’s birth, bathe and purify oneself in fasting, don immaculate ritual robes, and at dawn enter the chamber. Use the inner vision to illuminate the jade talisman, wash the eyes with limpid radiant water facing east, and rinse the mouth and cleanse the abdomen, ensuring inner and outer purity—no lingering tastes in the mouth, no residual warmth in the abdomen, no extraneous sights in the eyes, no dust on the body. In profound stillness, one’s being becomes the Dao alone.

Then turn to face south, sit upright, close the eyes, and inwardly visualize purple qi emerging above the crown of the head, surging vigorously toward the heavens, crowning one’s form with a canopy of qi, shrouding both inner and outer in mist. Draw in the purple qi, swallow it thirty-nine times, and as warmth arises, follow the swallowing into the mouth and abdomen. Upon completion, open the eyes to a sudden clarity, then knock the teeth three times and recite the incantation while looking upward:

*"Shangqing streaming rosy clouds, dawn of true auspiciousness,
Purple clouds illumine the numinous, yang accumulates in radiant exchange,
Flowing inward through the Golden Gate, the Jade Portal receives the vision,
Treasure spirits harmonize within, hun and po remain undispersed,
Luminous Sovereign of the Nine Perfected, the Eight Dao flow in abundance,
Grasping clouds to summon the void, the numinous descends from the Purple Han,
Penetrating the obscure origin, the Three Mornings feast as one,
Roaming and ascending the Jade Hall, paying homage at the Emperor’s abode."*

After reciting, swallow three times to conclude.

For the *Inner Vision Illuminating Jade Talisman*, write in vermilion on white paper, cast it into water, face east, knock the teeth three times, and recite the incantation:

*"The heavens bear no flying obscurities, the earth bears no drifting dust,
The jade talisman dispels filth, washing away the inauthentic,
Penetrating the mysterious void, summoning the numinous immortals."*

Upon completion, use the water to wash the eyes and rinse the mouth, purifying both inner and outer. Discard the remaining talisman water into the eastward flow.

The *Purple Script Formula* derives from the middle fascicle of the *Shangqing Jade Rosy Clouds Purple Illumination Inner Vision Scripture*. After eight years of practice, purple clouds will cover one’s body, the eyes will see with penetrating clarity, the Nine Heavens will be perceived in full, the body will emit wondrous light, and one will traverse myriad transformations, soaring through the Great Void. This Dao is most wondrous, transmitted only to those who have attained Perfection and not disseminated in the world.

Those whose names are inscribed in the *Mysterious Chart of Golden Characters* with green script from the Eastern Florescence, having obtained this text, must guard and practice it in secret. The true and numinous will readily respond, the summoning of immortals will easily succeed, the Dao will be complete, and qi will be abundant—ascending in broad daylight. Beware of careless transmission, lest the numinous fascicles be divulged.

The "first day of the upper decade of one’s birth" refers to those born in the *jiazi* decade, who should take the *jiayin* day as the first day of the upper decade; others follow accordingly.

The *Purple Script Formula* states: To practice the *Shangqing Jade Rosy Clouds Purple Illumination Inner Vision* Dao, regularly on the first day of the lunar month, take three *sheng* of westward-flowing water, place it in a golden vessel (a bronze vessel is also suitable), and add one *liang* of true cinnabar into the water, calling it the *Golden Essence Stone Radiance Water Mother Jade Embryo Essence*. Expose it in the central courtyard.

On the fifteenth day of the month at noon, let the essence of the sun’s light mystically illumine the *Stone Radiance Water Mother*, so that the sun’s image shines brilliantly within the water mother. Facing east, write the *Streaming Rosy Clouds Illuminating Penetrating Vision Jade Talisman* and cast it into the *Stone Radiance Water Mother*. Turn to face south, knock the teeth sixteen times, and recite aloud:

*"Solar soul, Pearl Radiance, Embryo Veil, Green Illumination, Rosy Clouds, Crimson Youth, Mystic Blazing Whirlwind Image."*

After reciting these sixteen characters, close the eyes and visualize five-colored streaming rosy clouds descending from the sun to crown one’s body, illuminating the entire form. Envision a celestial being within the sun, eight *cun* in height, wearing a vermilion yang-red crown, clad in crimson brocade and cinnabar skirts, standing above the crown of one’s head. The being draws the sun’s red cinnabar golden essence and *Stone Radiance Water Mother* radiance, pouring it over one’s form, then approaches the vessel containing the water essence and sunlight. Softly recite the incantation:

*"Radiant net of cinnabar yang, primordial radiance unfurled,
Crimson furnace of great brightness, the Nine Qi harmonize as one,
Three and Five refine the essence, the Two Images intertwine,
Jade embryo, stone marrow, refining the old to return to the new,
Streaming rosy clouds mystically infuse, the Water Mother congeals the spirit,
Harmonizing the hun, softening the po, inner and outer merge as mist,
Gaze upward to consume cinnabar blossoms, sip the sun’s root,
Spiritual mushrooms overflow, the face emits golden immortality,
One’s body merges with qi, one’s existence merges with the sun,
Riding the radiance to soar through space, ascending to the Emperor’s Morn."*

Upon completion, face the sun and swallow sixteen times. Take the *Stone Radiance Water Mother Essence*, face the sun to wash the eyes and bathe the body, then discard the remaining water into the westward flow.

After nine years of practice, the face will bear a golden countenance, inner and outer will be thoroughly illuminated, one’s radiance will match the sun’s, and one will soar through the mysterious void, ascending to the Gate of the Sun. This Dao is lofty and wondrous, not transmitted to the lower world. Those who lightly divulge its treasured text will be punished by ghostly soldiers, their bodies consigned to the Bureau of Ghosts upon death, and their seven generations of ancestors will suffer calamity.

For the *Streaming Rosy Clouds Illuminating Penetrating Vision Jade Talisman*, face east, write in vermilion on white paper, knock the teeth twelve times, and recite the incantation:

*"The Nine Paths of the Great Yang, the Eight Perfected shine as one,
Three and Five revolve and transform, merging with the cinnabar numen,
Stone Radiance Jade Embryo, essence of vermilion cinnabar,
Gather and absorb the flying mystery, descend to my form,
Ever united with the Three Mornings, sharing life and death together."*

Upon completion, cast the talisman into the *Stone Radiance Water Mother*.

The above is the *Shangqing Jade Rosy Clouds Purple Illumination Inner Vision* method, also called the *Golden Essence Stone Radiance Water Mother Jade Embryo Scripture* or the *Method of Gathering and Ingesting the Sun’s Root to Summon Rosy Clouds*. The Lord Emperor treasures and guards it in secret, inscribing the text in purple ink on purple-gold slips, sealing it within the chambers of the Nine Elders of the Supreme Immortal Capital, in the Jade Palace of the Jeweled Abode. According to the regulations, it emerges once every seven hundred years. Those whose names are inscribed in the *Mysterious Chart of Golden Characters* with green script from the *Shangqing* tradition, having obtained this text, will be attended by twelve *Taiyang* Golden Lads sent by the Emperor. After nine years of practice, they will attain transcendence, ascending to heaven in broad daylight to roam the Jade Palace of the Dark Mystery.

The Purple Writ’s Oral Instructions state: To cultivate the *Shangqing* Way of the Jade Radiance and Purple Reflection Inner Vision—the method of ascending to the Dark Mystery by daylight—one should, on the third day of the waxing moon, gather three *sheng* of the essence of the Eastern Well’s imperial blossom, which is the well’s first-drawn water. Store it in a golden vessel (a bronze vessel is also excellent) and expose it in the central courtyard. By the night of the sixteenth day of the moon, at midnight, let the moon’s essence and dark radiance reflect upon the imperial blossom’s cinnabar brilliance within the vessel. Face east, inscribe the *Yellow Qi* Yang Essence *Dongming* Numinous Talisman, and cast it into the imperial blossom vessel. Turn to the west, knock the teeth twenty-four times, and intone aloud:

*"Lunar orb, warm and fragrant, misty and graceful, empty and numinous, orchid-lush and blossom-twined, still as gold, pure as camp, fiery as the Terrace of Countenance’s standard."*

These are twenty-four characters in all. Upon completion, close the eyes and visualize the moon’s five-colored flowing essence and purple light descending to crown the body, enveloping it entirely. Within the moon, envision a perfected being, nine *cun* in height, wearing a purple coronet, clad in a yellow brocade flying skirt, standing above one’s head. This being draws the imperial blossom from the moon and pours it over the body. Then, facing the imperial blossom vessel and reflecting the moonlight, softly recite the incantation:

*"Numinous unfolding, radiant blossom,
Three and Five interpenetrate the pure,
Purple and yellow intertwine and descend,
Dual qi merge as one,
Celestial origin divides and unites,
Revolving through waxing and waning,
Imperial mushroom overflows,
Yellow embryo crystallizes essence,
Perfected within the radiance,
Mold and bathe my form,
Moon Sovereign and Lady,
Secure my yellow tranquility,
Jade pendants and golden bells,
Render me utterly luminous,
Wane with the moon,
Wax with the moon,
Ever feast on imperial blossoms,
Ascend to the Emperor’s court,
Float through the great void,
Pilot the flying wheel,
Supreme offering without end,
Eons of longevity."*

Upon completion, face the moon and swallow twenty-four times. Then, take the imperial blossom and, facing the moon, wash the eyes and bathe the entire body. Finally, release any remaining water into an eastward-flowing stream.

Practicing this for nine years, the eyes will perceive the empty and boundless, seeing clearly for ten thousand *li*, discerning fortune and misfortune in reverse. The countenance will be refined, the body transformed, the face suffused with jade essence, the form emanating purple light. One will ride the void, soar through the heavens, and ascend to the *Shangqing* realm.

This Way is lofty and wondrous, not to be transmitted to the lower world. Those who recklessly divulge its sacred writ will be punished by divine soldiers, their bodies consigned to the dark springs, their misfortune flowing through ten thousand generations, forever bound to the offices of ghosts.

This *Yellow Qi* Yang Essence *Dongming* Numinous Talisman is inscribed facing east, with a yellow brush on blue-green paper. Knock the teeth twelve times and recite the incantation:

*"Yang conceals, Yin arises,
Dual qi circulate and converge,
Celestial origin blends and unites,
Three and Five respond to the tally,
Ingest and command imperial blossoms,
Numinous descent into my frame,
Ever partake of radiant qi,
Abide with the spirits in repose,
Transcend the Nine Mysteries,
Join the flying chariot’s ascent."*

Upon completion, cast the talisman into the imperial blossom vessel.

This *Shangqing* method of the Jade Radiance and Purple Reflection Inner Vision is also called the *Scripture of Concealing Heaven and Hiding the Moon’s Jade Embryo* or the *Eight Simplicities Perfected Scripture of Ingesting the Moon’s Imperial Blossom*. The Lord Emperor treasures and guards it in secret, inscribing the text in purple ink on purple-gold slips, sealing it within the chambers of the Nine Elders of the Supreme Immortal Capital, in the Jade Palace of the Jeweled Abode. According to the regulations, it emerges once every seven hundred years. Those whose names are inscribed in the *Mysterious Chart of Golden Characters* with green script from the *Shangqing* tradition, having obtained this text, will be attended by twelve *Xihua* Jade Maidens sent by the Emperor. After nine years of practice, they will attain transcendence, ascending to heaven in broad daylight to roam the Emperor’s chambers.

In practicing this Way, for three days prior, one must bathe with orchid fragrance, maintain a pure fast in a separate chamber, avoid worldly affairs, and meditate upon the perfected and numinous. Facing the dawn’s radiance, proceed as if gazing upon the Emperor’s visage, accumulating resonance until the appointed day of transformation into an immortal. If the sky is overcast, one may also perform the practice indoors through visualization, for the Way lies in concentrated thought, and resonance will thus be achieved.

The Purple Writ’s Oral Instructions state: To cultivate the Way of the Supreme Perfected, one should practice on the third, fifteenth, and twenty-fifth days of the third, ninth, and twelfth lunar months—three months a year, three times each month. These months are when the Primordial Father of the Nine Heavens undergoes transformation, and these days are when he roams and feasts in the upper palaces of the Nine Heavens, aligning with the celestial tally.

On these days, bathe and fast in seclusion, avoiding worldly affairs. Face the northeast and visualize the Primordial Father of the Nine Heavens: his name, his height of nine *cun* and nine *fen*, his sash of dark yellow and plain numinous silk, his head adorned with a vermilion jade cap of seven measures, and the *Wuji* Advancing Worthies’ coronet. He resides above the Nine Heavens, in the Jade Treasure Palace of the Supreme Ultimate’s Jeweled Abode, within the Cinnabar Numinous Village and Cavern Origin Hamlet. At times, he rides a flying chariot of azure radiance, accompanied by twelve flying dragons and twenty-four immortals, with cranes flanking the wheels, roaming above the empty and mysterious.

Visualize him clearly, as if facing his countenance. Then, bow nine times to the Primordial Father and silently invoke him three times, saying: *"I, so-and-so, have a request: grant me ascent to serve the Emperor’s numen."* Knock the teeth nine times and intone the incantation:

*"Supreme Lord Emperor,
Primordial Great Spirit,
Conjoined with the true qi of lineage,
Form resplendent in the purple heavens,
Riding clouds and driving the floating,
Trailing radiance through the eight mists,
Turning the wheel in graceful descent,
Sheltering my body with the Way,
Grant me to ride the dawn’s radiance,
To serve the numinous axle.
Today at the Eight Assemblies,
I humbly present my supreme wish:
All I seek and petition,
May it be as spoken,
Ever partake of primal auspiciousness,
Abide with the Emperor in eternity."*

Upon completion, face upward and swallow nine times.

If the Primordial Father is moved and the Emperor pleased, they will command the recording of one’s name in the golden register of immortals. After nine years of concentrated practice, a jade chariot will be dispatched to welcome the body, ascending in broad daylight to the Emperor’s dawn.

This Way is lofty and wondrous, not to be shared with the lower world’s ordinary learners. Without one’s name inscribed in the *Mysterious Chart of Golden Characters* with green script from the *Shangqing* tradition, none may know or see it. If, by chance, one encounters this sacred text, it is because one is destined for transcendence. One should treasure and secretly practice it.

To speak lightly of this is not true devotion—such transgression extends to seven generations of one’s ancestors, condemning them to eternal imprisonment in hell, never to be absolved. The body perishes under the jurisdiction of demonic officials, and transcendence becomes forever unattainable.

The *Purple Script Formula* states: For those who cultivate the Dao of the Supreme Perfected, the months of the second, seventh, and tenth lunar months—specifically the fifth, sixteenth, and twenty-ninth days of each—are appointed times. These three months in a year, with three days in each, mark the months when the Primordial Mother of the Nine Heavens begins her transformative generation, and the days when the Celestial Origin converges in celebration, shifting the feminine virtue of heaven.

On these days, one must bathe in purity, fast in seclusion, and withdraw from worldly affairs. At midnight, step into the central courtyard under the open sky, face the southwest, and with upturned gaze, meditate upon the name of the Primordial Mother of the Nine Heavens. Envision her as six inches and six parts in height, clad in a luminous divine robe of emerald brocade and nine-colored frost-silk sashes. She wears a crown of purple and primordial yellow, abides above the boundless qi of the Nine Heavens, within the Sevenfold Radiance Palace of the Jasper Forest, the Jade Treasure Cavern of the Primordial, and the Upper Clarity Precinct of the Ninefold Radiance Realm. At that moment, she rides a purple cloud beneath a canopy of flying essence-feathers, accompanied by twelve phoenixes and thirty-six jade maidens, with phoenix-attendants and immortal escorts, roaming above the Great Clarity and within the boundless expanse.

Visualize her with utmost clarity, as if she stands vividly before you. Then prostrate nine times before the Primordial Mother, and thrice invoke her in silent reverence, confessing: "Impure and defiled, my base form yearns for the true. I aspire to Upper Clarity, beseeching your gaze and reception, that I may serve the Jade Spirit." Strike the teeth nine times and recite the incantation while looking upward:

*"Three unite, five disperse,
Dual origins merge and transform.
Qi congeals into spirit,
Spirit transmutes and unites with the soul.
Nurtured in the womb of the Nine Heavens,
Guard the gate of life.
Yin essence descends in mystery,
Purifying the source of form.
Refine the substance, infuse with qi,
Receive transformation by nature.
What day is this?
The Primordial Mother reveals herself.
Eight vows, nine assemblies,
Attain the Celestial Perfected above.
Resonance responds to the subtle,
Gaining audience with the Jade Dawn.
Bones ascend, flesh takes flight,
Riding the void, threading the mist,
Ascending to the Purple Chariot,
To eternally assist the Emperor’s ministers."*

Upon completion, swallow nine times and cease.

If the Primordial Mother is pleased and the Empress delighted, the Celestial Perfected will descend, allowing one to behold her divine countenance. She will then command the Azure Palace to inscribe one’s name in the jade register. After nine years of concentrated practice, the Emperor will dispatch jade maidens riding clouds to welcome the practitioner, ascending to the Jade Clarity to serve in the Mysterious Palace.

This Dao is lofty and wondrous, unknown to the world. Only those whose names are inscribed in the imperial records of the Golden Register may encounter this text—all such individuals are destined for transcendence, fated to ascend and roam the Nine Heavens in celestial feasts. Guard this secret closely; to reveal it lightly is to invite the Three Officials to seize one’s body, subjecting seven generations of ancestors to torment in the Yellow Springs. Never speak of it carelessly.

All who practice this Dao must cultivate with utmost sincerity, gazing upward to behold the divine countenance and yearning for the descent of the mysterious. Only thus may one attain flight as an immortal. Avoid defilement, lest one offend the Supreme Perfected and incur divine prohibition, forever barred from transcendence.

If the sky is overcast and the sun obscured, the practice may be conducted in a quiet chamber. As long as heart and eyes align, voice and resonance harmonize, no spirit will remain unmoved, no Dao will fail to descend, no learning will go unfulfilled. When the Dao descends and the spirit attaches, one may soar through the vastness of the heavens.

The *Purple Script Formula* further states: For those who cultivate the Dao of the Supreme Perfected, the ninth day of the ninth month, the seventh day of the seventh month, and the third day of the third month are appointed times—days when the Perfected Ladies of the Nine Heavens celebrate the Jade Peace, roaming and feasting in the celestial courts, unfolding and receiving the numinous.

On these days, bathe with five fragrances, fast in seclusion, and withdraw from worldly affairs. At midnight, step into the open, burn incense, face north, and with upturned gaze, meditate upon the name of the Perfected Lady of the Nine Heavens. Envision her as seven inches and seven parts in height, clad in a seven-colored radiant cloud-gauze and a luminous nine-colored purple brocade flying skirt. She wears a crown of primordial yellow with seven tiers, the *Advancing Worthiness* diadem, and resides in the Supreme Purple Jasper Palace, the Jade Radiance Terrace of the Sevenfold Radiance Precinct, and the Golden Radiance Realm of the Non-Action Precinct.

At that moment, she rides a purple mist beneath a flying canopy of green and a vermilion chariot, accompanied by thirty-six jade maidens of the Upper Palace, each holding divine mushrooms and five-colored banners, escorting flying phoenixes and white simurghs, roaming above the Nine Mysteries and the edge of the Azure Heavens.

Once the visualization is complete, bow four times in reverence to the Perfected Lady, strike the teeth twenty-four times, and recite the incantation while looking upward:

*"The Celestial Perfected returns in celebration,
Roaming and feasting in the Purple Heavens.
Unfolding and receiving the numinous,
Harmonizing movement without pause.
Above, ascending to the Jade Palace;
Below, gazing upon your servant.
Eight assemblies open,
Nine vows intertwine.
Subtle thoughts establish resonance,
Above, the divine spirits are moved.
Flowing essence refines and pours,
Jade splendor descends upon the body.
Boundless blessings,
Eternally cultivating the field of mushrooms."*

Upon completion, swallow twenty-four times and cease.

If the Perfected Lady is moved and the Divine Consort delighted, they will report to the Jade Emperor, presenting one’s jade name for inscription in the Eastern Florescence and inclusion in the jade records of the Jade Clarity. After nine years of cultivation, one’s face will radiate golden countenance, the body will shimmer with jade light, the Divine Consort will commune, and the spirit will stand before the Perfected. One will then ascend in a flying canopy to roam and feast in the Purple Courts.

This method is lofty and wondrous, unknown to the world. Only those whose names are inscribed in the purple records of the imperial register may encounter this secret text—such individuals are destined for transcendence. The *Purple Script Formula* further states: For the Dao of the *Sun’s Radiance within the Mysterious*, one should choose the days of *bing-wu* and *geng-wu*, at noon. Place a nine-inch bright mirror in the central courtyard under the open sky, allowing the sunlight to reflect within it. Face south toward the mirror, strike the teeth twenty-four times, and recite the incantation:

*"Sun’s essence, radiant net,
Flowing light illumines the numinous.
Eightfold brilliance, celestial weft,
Traversing the heavens in due course.
Jade embryo fills,
Mysterious light child,
Sun’s radiance, red essence,
Returns the true, curves the reflection.
At noon’s stillness, all is luminous.
Golden mirror gathers mist,
Merging with my form.
Dual luminaries align,
Joining the sun as one.
Eighty-one breaths,
Stomach blooms with splendor.
Eternally preserve sun and moon,
Heaven and earth incline in harmony."*

Look up to the heavens and draw the sunlight into the mouth, inhaling and swallowing thirty-six breaths. When finished, return to face the mirror once more, then inhale and swallow the sun’s essence within the mirror forty-five times. Together, these make eighty-one breaths. This is the Dao of the Mysterious Within the Sun’s Radiance. This is the supreme method of the Jade Emperor, transmitted to the Woman of Lu, who refined the essence to ascend to the Jade Court. This method is a precious secret; it must not be carelessly transmitted. If transmitted to the unworthy, calamity will extend to the seven generations of ancestors, and the body will be consigned to serve as a lowly ghost, never attaining immortality.

When cultivating the Dao of the Mysterious Within the Sun’s Radiance, if the sky is overcast and the sun is not visible, one may practice indoors, but the breaths swallowed should be doubled to one hundred sixty-two. The mirror must always be kept bright and free of dust or grime. It must not be carelessly allowed for others to gaze into, for this is a grave taboo. If three people have gazed into it, the Sun’s Radiance Child and the Red Essence Two Lords will descend in clouds, causing one to lose sight and spirit—beware of this.

The Purple Book’s Oral Instructions state: On the days of conjunction at the new moon, when the qi of Heaven and Earth intermingle and the cycle completes, yin qi surges while yang essence wanes. *"Sun Radiance Child, yang light and red essence,
Radiant Net Perfected, jade spirit within the reflection,
Traversing the course borne by qi,
Above and below, all is solemn and clear.
Yin’s encroaching schemes
Invade the sun’s court.
Heaven dispatches its arms,
Imperial ministers lead the troops.
The Three and Five stand in rectitude,
Yang’s light shines through.
Heaven and Earth alternate in sustenance—
What merchant dares arise?
Return each to its place,
Let none diminish or overflow.
The Jade Emperor’s decree commands,
None dare disobey."*

When finished, inhale qi twenty-four times and stop. Thus, Heaven and Earth return to their positions, the Three and Five align in brilliance, the Child is moved to joy, the sun’s radiance returns its spirit, and flowing light mysteriously pours down, refining and descending into one’s body. One’s name will then be inscribed on the purple tablets and recorded in the Jade Clarity Register. Within nine years, one will ride a green chariot, soaring through the void to ascend to the Upper Clarity.

The Purple Book’s Oral Instructions state: On the day of a lunar eclipse, when yin qi wanes and yang qi waxes, the degrees of their courses intersect, and the two luminaries contend. This is when Heaven and Earth experience the separation and union of the sun and moon’s distinct qi. On the evening of a lunar eclipse, when the proper qi is encroached upon, the Five Stars, the Morning Department of the Imperial Bureaus, and the commands of the Great Yin marshal their forces to guard the spirit. On such an evening, go out into the central courtyard with a vat of clear water. Hold a blade, face the moon over the water, and strike the teeth sixteen times while reciting the incantation:

*"Heaven and Earth separate and unite,
Bearing qi, they exploit the waning.
Encroaching upon the moon’s abode,
They offend the yellow radiance.
Imperial ministers wield their staves,
The Jade Morning captures the transgressors.
Heavenly soldiers encircle the domain,
Divine lords unleash their might.
What merchant dares arise,
Riding shadows, exploiting the faint?
Swiftly return to your original place,
Let nothing transgress."*

Recite this three times while facing the moon, then stir the water in the vat three times with the blade in the right hand. Face the water and inhale, swallowing qi sixteen times. When finished, the lunar eclipse will dissolve, the celestial scene will be solemn and clear, the Three and Five will align in splendor, and the ten thousand palaces will be at peace. The Lady of the Moon’s True Person, her spirit radiant, will be moved to joy, returning her spirit’s mysterious reflection and descending her favor upon you. She will then report to the Northern Emperor, erasing your name from the register of the dead and inscribing it in the Jade Register of the Upper Clarity Palace. She will assign you twelve jade maidens to attend and guard your body. Practicing this for nine years, you will ride flying rosy clouds to ascend to the Moon Court. This method is most wondrous and not practiced in the world; those who receive it must treasure and keep it secret, never transmitting it lightly.

When finished, if the deceased is male, summon three jade lads; if female, summon seven jade maidens. Pour the consecrated water over the corpse of the deceased. When done, take the water to wash one’s hands and face, look up to the heavens and spit, then silently recite: "The heavenly qi is now clear, the human transformation is now complete. Born anew in the heavens above, undergoing nine transformations to receive form. The Five Sufferings and Three Paths sever the name of death. Deliver the destitute souls, return them to the Southern Court." Cease.

Thus, the deceased shall be reborn and transformed in the heavens above. After nine years, they shall ascend to the Jade Clarity Palace. They come to invite the disciple into the Jade Valley, where they pour white fungus and pure water over the corpse. In an instant, imagine the corpse reviving and becoming human once more. Then recite the yin incantation:

"Withered, revive in glory;
Extinguished, live again.
Attaining life in Heaven above,
Receiving once more the Supreme Numinous.
Through the kalpas of the Nine Heavens,
Reversing the cycles of womb and infancy,
Accumulating and dissolving away,
The white corpse returns to life."

After reciting, wipe the eyes fourteen times. Thus, the impure qi is immediately dispelled, the dead person is transformed anew, and later becomes a spirit-person.

If the disciple encounters this twenty-four times and practices this refining incantation, merit is fulfilled and virtue is augmented. Their name is inscribed in the Upper Clarity, and after twenty-four years, they shall ascend upon cloud chariots, soaring through the Nine Mysteries.

The *Scripture of the Celestial Venerable of Primordial Beginning*

The Celestial Venerable of Primordial Beginning received the natural progeny of Heaven, coalescing form from the undifferentiated mists of chaos, entrusting his essence to the womb of emptiness, and emerging amid the boundless void. Proceeding to the Golden Portals, he received the title of Supreme Primordial August Emperor of Jade Purity and Purple Emptiness.

Heavenly majesty blazed in the vast courtyard. Azure feathered canopies streamed with purple phoenix sigils, golden perfection and jade radiance blazed through the Seven Origins. Golden tablets with green characters perfectly submit the jade name,
Brightly beholding the Nine Heavens, ascending to sport in the Three Purities.
The Three Celestial Charts of the Celestial Passes are traversed, returning to the Purple Court;
The Golden Gates bestow a title, the Eastern Florescence records life.
Attaining the Eight Effulgences, they join the flight of the cloud chariot."*

When finished, they swallow *qi* nine times and cease.

For those who study yet do not know the method of parting the Celestial Passes or the way of submitting tablets and recording names, all their efforts shall come to naught.

The Three Passes govern all the heavens, all the earths, the perfected *zhenren* who ascend as flying immortals, and even the initial records of beginning students—none fail to pass through these Three Passes. For all who accumulate learning, if they can ensure their jade names are inscribed within the Nine Heavens’ Three Passes, and if the Jade Morning of the Three Passes submits to the Palace of the Supreme Great Emperor, then the Imperial Lord shall dispatch twelve jade lads and twelve jade maidens to guard and protect their person. This is the supreme scripture of the Supreme Emperor, transmitted to the Celestial Imperial Lord; the Celestial Imperial Lord transmitted it to the Upper Prime Lord of the Southern Culmen; the Upper Prime Lord of the Southern Culmen transmitted it to the Celestial Imperial Lord of the Grand Tenuity; the Celestial Imperial Lord of the Grand Tenuity transmitted it to the Imperial Lord of the Golden Gates; the Imperial Lord of the Golden Gates transmitted it to the Azure Lad, the Supreme Minister, instructing him to teach later students who are destined to become *zhenren*. According to the mysterious statutes, within seven hundred years, three transmissions are permitted.

The Upper Prime Lord commands ninety maidens of the Western Florescence to guard within the Purple Chamber of the Southern Culmen. The Azure Lad says: Those whose bone configurations align with the mysterious may behold this Dao, and knowing the method of submitting tablets, they shall become *zhenren*. Yet the statutes are exceedingly weighty, and it must not be lightly disclosed. Among the multitudes of scholars, how few encounter the true! Thus the Yellow Elder of the Central says: To behold the *Thirty-Nine Chapters of the Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern* is to ascend to heaven in broad daylight. Yet some who cultivate it for years achieve nothing and then claim the scripture is not true. This is entirely due to the absence of a golden tablet’s entry in the Eastern Florescence and the lack of a jade slip’s name in the Golden Gates. The perfected do not descend for them, and they are instead ridden by celestial demons, thus failing to achieve resonance, merely obtaining spirit scriptures, and accomplishing nothing. Had they first submitted a golden tablet to the Azure Palace and presented a jade slip to the Imperial Sovereign, receiving the attendance of the Golden Morning’s jade lads and the Western Florescence’s jade maidens to guard the numinous text, with all heavens and earths universally approving, chanting the verses ten thousand times—would they not have evoked the response of jade chariots and purple carriages?

**Text for Parting the Three Passes and Submitting Jade Slips to Ascend as an Immortal:**

*At the Jade Terrace of the Celestial Pass, beneath the Jade Morning’s Supervisory Bureau:*
[Name of commandery, county, village, and hamlet], *zhenren* Wang [given name], aged [number] years, styled [courtesy name].

*At the Jade Terrace of the Celestial Chart, beneath the Jade Lad of the Supreme Direct Perfected:*
[Name of commandery, county, village, and hamlet], *zhenren* Wang [given name], aged [number] years, styled [courtesy name].

*At the Jade Terrace of the Celestial Pass, beneath the Jade Bureau of the Supreme Emperor’s Perfected:*
[Name of commandery, county, village, and hamlet], *zhenren* Wang [given name], aged [number] years, styled [courtesy name].

Write the above on three jade slips, each one foot and six inches in length.

**Text for Parting the Golden Gates and Submitting Jade Slips to Ascend as an Immortal:**

*Before the Imperial Lord of the Golden Gates Palace:*
[Name of commandery, county, village, and hamlet], *zhenren* Wang [given name], aged [number] years, styled [courtesy name], born in the [ordinal] month.

Write the above on a jade slip, one foot and six inches in length.

The Azure Lad says: If one lacks a golden tablet, silver or wood may suffice; if one lacks a jade slip, paulownia wood may suffice. Let them be refined and fine, with straight grain and no knots.

The Azure Lad says: When visualizing parting the Celestial Pass, the Celestial Chart, and the Celestial Pass to ascend the path to the Azure Palace, the Golden Gates, and the Jade Purity, one must inscribe the jade slip. First, enter the chamber, click the teeth twelve times, face east, and read the slip. Then, complete the method of cultivation, visualization, and contemplation. Place the slip in a cloud-brocade pouch, constantly burn incense beside it, and do not lightly reveal it. This is the supreme title of the highest perfected, the numinous scripture of the Jade Lads.

If one’s golden name and jade characters are retroactively inscribed in the Azure Palace and one beholds this Dao, they must follow the statutes of the Supreme Perfected. Prepare one golden tablet and one jade slip, each one foot and six inches long and two inches and four *fen* wide, along with one golden dragon and one jade fish. Use one hundred feet of purple silk and forty feet of green damask as the covenant of the Supreme Perfected, offering them to one’s master who possesses the scriptures. The master faces east, the recipient faces north, and they report to the Northern Emperor as a covenant, swearing to the Seven Ancestors as a pledge, vowing not to divulge the secret. According to the mysterious statutes, within seven hundred years, three transmissions are permitted. If transmitted to an unworthy person, the seven generations of ancestors shall be consigned to eternal ghostly servitude, the body shall perish in the Nine Springs, and immortality shall never be attained.

Those of steadfast resolve, those who aspire to immortality, must follow the statutes and serve the perfected, cultivating in accordance with the text.

Here ends the final scroll of the *Scriptures of the Golden Root of the Purple Writ of the Azure Essentials of the Highest Purity of the Great Cavern*.

chunks.original_text: 洞真上清青要紫书金根众经 经名：洞真上清青要紫书金根众经。 撰人不祥，约出於东晋。 系早期上清派重要经典。 二卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》正一部。 洞真上清青要紫书金根众经 上相青童君撰 洞真上清青要紫书金根众经卷上 青要帝君者，乃九阳元皇玉帝之弟子，以中皇元年岁在东维，天始告晖，君育於玄丘玉国无崖之天，琼林七宝之下，溟蒙九域之滨，法化应图，三日启晨，厥姓尧，讳字曰伯开。 仍有九龙翼君侧，七色琼凤荫君身，神鳞含芝以玄哺，天女吐精以观真，玉童掷华以却秽，神妃散香以攘尘，含嗽以胎息。 法秀自然，华冠二六，面发金容，体生灵符，言韵金章，七十二色，洞映玉清，三晨丽景，六炁齐軿，玄云紫盖生乎房，飞精流光照其庭，含真独操，熙颐灵嵎，容序顺化，随运沉浮，栖心明霞之境，敖浪玉国之墟，执抗元皇之策，落景九域之丘。 逍遥流盻，遂经累劫，方还清斋云房之间，以紫云为屋，青霞为城，黄金为殿，白玉为床，五炁交结，高台连甍，玉陛文阶，凤阙四张，金童侍侧，玉华执巾，天仙罗卫，五千余人，备天之狩，羽骑如鳞，龙虎辟邪，偶偶双蹲，玄炁九会，灵风扬烟，芳香激天，虚生琼宫，流精玉光，洞映十天，萧条高畅，独演灵篇，餐精咽炁，咀嚼玄根，服饵还白玉酒，金液流精，玉林结华，日月皇泉，炼骨易髓，举体成真。 元阳元皇玉帝君，时乘碧霞九凤飞舆，琼轮羽盖，从桑林千真，万乘亿骑，飞行侍仙三十六人，宴景霄庭，来降於君。 与君共登九老仙都之京，九曲之房，命西台龟母开云凤之蕴，紫锦之囊，出紫书真诀玉篇，以授於君。 君修行道备，位登玉清，太上大道君授君飞云羽盖，流紫凤章，金真玉光豁落七元金神虎符，流金火铃青精玉玺，九色无缝之章，单青羽裙，飞行上清。 於是纵景万变，回转五晨，策虚召月，摄日扬轮，洞化离合，与真同灵，解形遁变，鲦钦亿千，上登三元，朝谒玉宫，游览无崖，胤洛九天，出入洞门，携契玉仙，仰禀高上元始太真，应炁顺命，位掌帝晨，总统万道，无仙不关，下摄十天山灵河源、五岳四海，莫不上隶於君。 自飞常图於紫虚，金名於青宫，紫书不可得而窥，金根不可得而闻也。 青要是紫清帝君之别号，受元皇玉帝紫书妙诀，皆众经之要，秘九天之上，书八会之隐文也。 玉帝命高上值真总仙君，科集宝目，合为众经，以紫笔缮文，金兰为篇，皆出上皇玄古之道，高圣所撰集，集以成卷，传於青要帝君，帝君传上虚皇元灵道君，道君传太素高灵洞曜道君，道君传南极上元君，上元君传天帝君，天帝君传太微天帝君，天帝君传后圣九玄帝君，九玄帝君传上相青童君，掌箓琼宫。 夫有宿命，应见此文者，皆玄挺开会，必有神仙定箓也。 玉帝宝秘，不传於世，妄说之者，则九天刺奸，奏於帝君，言子之罪，太上使五帝神兵罚子之身，死为下鬼，充塞河源，七祖父母，受拷水官，学者慎科，秘而奉焉。 若有金骸玉骨，名书帝录，得见此文，当依九真玄科，修行法度，案盟赍信，金龙、玉鱼各一枚，紫缯百尺，青纹四十尺，诣经师而授之。 师与弟子对斋七百日，按科七百年有人，听得三传，不依科文，轻泄秘篇，身没鬼官，七祖充责，万不得仙。

**The Supreme Cavern-Perfected Azure Essentials and Purple Writ of the Golden Root: A Compendium of Scriptures**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Cavern-Perfected Azure Essentials and Purple Writ of the Golden Root: A Compendium of Scriptures*
**Author:** Unknown, approximately dated to the Eastern Jin dynasty. A foundational text of the early Shangqing (Highest Clarity) tradition. Two fascicles.
**Source Text:** *Daoist Canon of the Orthodox Tradition*, Zhengyi Section, First Division.

---

### *The Supreme Cavern-Perfected Azure Essentials and Purple Writ of the Golden Root: A Compendium of Scriptures, Fascicle One*
**Composed by the Most Exalted Azure Youth Lord**

The Azure Essentials Emperor is a disciple of the Primordial Yang Jade Emperor of the Nine Heavens. In the first year of the Central August Era, when the year stood in the Eastern Pivot and the heavens first proclaimed their radiance, he was born in the Jade Realm of the Boundless Heaven upon the Dark Mound, beneath the Seven Jeweled Forest of the Luminous Grove, by the shores of the Nine Domains. His transformation in accordance with the cosmic pattern occurred at dawn on the third day. His surname was Yao, and his personal name was styled Bokai.

Nine dragons flanked his sides, while seven-hued jade phoenixes shaded his form. Divine scales bore sacred mushrooms to nourish him with the dark essence, and celestial maidens exhaled their essence to behold his truth. Jade lads scattered blossoms to dispel impurity, and spirit consorts diffused incense to repel dust. He contained his breath in embryonic respiration.

His dharma was naturally resplendent, his cap adorned with the twelve celestial signs. His face radiated a golden countenance, his body bore numinous talismans, and his speech resonated with golden verses in seventy-two hues, illuminating the Jade Clarity. For three dawns, his splendor shone; the six *qi* aligned in harmony. Dark clouds and purple canopies arose in his chamber, while flying essences and streaming light illumined his courtyard. Abiding in solitary integrity, he nurtured his spirit in the sacred recesses. His bearing followed the cosmic order, rising and falling with the turning of the ages. He dwelled in the realm of luminous rosy clouds and roamed the wastes of the Jade Realm, wielding the strategies of the Primordial August Emperor, descending upon the mounds of the Nine Domains.

Wandering at ease, his gaze flowing freely, he traversed countless kalpas before returning to the cloud chambers of the pure retreat. There, purple clouds formed his dwelling, azure mists his city walls, yellow gold his halls, and white jade his couch. The five *qi* intertwined, high terraces connected by eaves, jade steps adorned with patterns, and phoenix towers opened on four sides. Golden lads attended him, jade maidens held his towels, and celestial immortals—over five thousand in number—arrayed themselves as his celestial guard. Feathered riders thronged like scales, dragons and tigers warded off evil, and pairs of divine beasts crouched in symmetry. The dark *qi* convened in nine assemblies, numinous winds stirred the mist, and fragrant incense ascended to the heavens. The void gave birth to jeweled palaces, and flowing essence radiated jade light, illuminating the Ten Heavens. In lofty seclusion, he alone expounded the sacred texts, consuming essence and swallowing *qi*, chewing upon the dark root. He ingested the returning white jade wine, the golden liquid flowing with essence, while jade forests blossomed. The sun and moon were his imperial springs, refining his bones and transmuting his marrow, his entire being attaining perfection.

At that time, the Primordial Yang Jade Emperor of the Nine Heavens rode a nine-phoenix flying chariot of azure mist, its wheels of jade and canopy of feathers. Accompanied by a thousand perfected ones from the Mulberry Grove and a retinue of ten thousand chariots and a hundred million riders, with thirty-six flying immortals in attendance, he descended to the Azure Court of the Radiant Heavens to visit the Azure Essentials Emperor.

Together, they ascended the capital of the Nine Elders’ Immortal Metropolis and entered the Ninefold Chambers. The Western Terrace’s Tortoise Mother was commanded to open the cloud-phoenix repository and the purple brocade satchel, from which she produced the Purple Writ of the True Oral Instructions and the Jade Fascicle, bestowing them upon the Azure Essentials Emperor.

Having completed his cultivation of the Dao, the Azure Essentials Emperor ascended to the Jade Clarity. The Most High Lord of the Great Dao conferred upon him a flying cloud feathered canopy, the flowing purple phoenix script, the golden true jade light of the Seven Primes’ divine tiger tally, the flowing gold fire bell, the azure essence jade seal, the nine-hued seamless seal, and a feathered skirt of pure azure, enabling him to soar through the Highest Clarity.

Thereupon, he commanded the myriad transformations of light, revolved the five dawns, summoned the moon through the void, and seized the sun to set its wheel in motion. His transformations penetrated the mysteries of separation and union, uniting with the perfected in numinosity. Liberating his form, he traversed countless myriad changes, ascending to the Three Primes to pay homage at the Jade Palace. He roamed the boundless, traversed the Nine Heavens of Yin and Luo, entered and exited the cavern portals, and forged pacts with the jade immortals. Gazing upward, he received the decrees of the Most High Primordial Perfected of the Supreme Origin, aligning with the *qi* and following the mandate. His position governed the imperial dawn, and he oversaw the myriad Dao, none of the immortals being beyond his purview. Below, he oversaw the mountain spirits and river sources of the Ten Heavens, the Five Peaks and Four Seas—none failed to submit to his authority.

Since then, he has soared through the Purple Void, his golden name inscribed in the Azure Palace. The Purple Writ cannot be glimpsed, nor the Golden Root heard.

"Azure Essentials" is an alternate title of the Purple Clarity Emperor. Having received the Purple Writ of the Jade Emperor’s wondrous oral instructions—all essentials of the scriptures—he concealed them above the Nine Heavens, inscribing the hidden texts of the Eight Assemblies.

The Jade Emperor commanded the Most High Attendant Perfected Lord of the Assembly of Immortals to compile and collate the precious catalog, uniting them into a compendium of scriptures. With purple brush, he transcribed the texts, binding them in golden orchid fascicles—all derived from the Dao of the Supreme August and the Primordial Ancient, compiled by the loftiest sages. Gathered into fascicles, they were transmitted to the Azure Essentials Emperor, who passed them to the Supreme Void August Primordial Numinous Lord of the Dao. The Lord of the Dao transmitted them to the High Numinous Cavern Radiance Lord of the Great Simplicity, who passed them to the Supreme August Lord of the Southern Culmen. The Supreme August Lord transmitted them to the Heavenly Emperor Lord, who passed them to the Heavenly Emperor Lord of the Supreme Tenuity. The Heavenly Emperor Lord transmitted them to the Posterior Sage Lord of the Nine Mysteries, who finally bestowed them upon the Most Exalted Azure Youth Lord, keeper of the registers in the Jeweled Palace.

Those with predestined affinity who encounter this text have surely been divinely chosen to open the celestial assembly and are destined to receive the immortal registers.

The Jade Emperor treasures and conceals these scriptures, forbidding their transmission to the world. Those who recklessly divulge them shall be denounced by the Nine Heavens as deceivers and reported to the Emperor Lord. The Most High shall dispatch the divine soldiers of the Five Emperors to punish their bodies, condemning them to death as lowly ghosts, filling the river sources. Their seven generations of ancestors shall suffer torment in the Water Bureau. Scholars must heed the regulations and guard these secrets with reverence.

If one possesses a golden skeleton and jade bones, their name inscribed in the imperial records, and gains access to this text, they must follow the mysterious regulations of the Nine Perfected, cultivate the dharma disciplines, and present offerings in accordance with the covenants: one golden dragon and one jade fish as tokens, a hundred feet of purple silk, and forty feet of azure damask. They shall seek out a master of the scriptures to receive transmission.

Master and disciple shall perform a seven-hundred-day retreat in mutual purification. According to the regulations, only after seven hundred years may one be deemed worthy of receiving the three transmissions. Those who fail to adhere to the scriptural precepts and lightly divulge the secret fascicles shall be consigned to the Bureau of Ghosts upon death, their seven generations of ancestors held accountable, and they shall never attain immortality.

chunks.original_text: 凡修上真之道，披咏黄庭玉景万遍之根，通释三宫，开明幽关，乃得修行紫书玉诀，招真致灵白日升玄之法。 紫书诀言：凡修上真之道，当行上清玉霞紫映内观上法。 常以本生上旬之日，沐浴清斋，盛洁法服，平旦入室，以内观开明玉符，清华之水，东向洗眼，并嗽荡口腹，令内外清虚，口无余味，腹无余熏，眼无余视，体无余尘，泊泊静默，唯道是身。 然后还南向，平坐瞑目，内思紫炁出兆头顶之上，勃勃冲天，气冠己形，内外郁冥。 便引紫炁，仰咽三十九通，觉热，随咽入兆口腹之中。 咽讫，开眼，朗然豁除，便叩齿三通，仰咒曰： 上清流霞，晖真吉旦，紫云映灵，阳积交焕，内注金门，玉户受观，宝神和藏，魂魄无散，明皇九真，八道流羡，攀云招虚，灵降紫汉，洞彻幽元，三晨齐宴，游腾玉堂，上拜帝馆。 毕，仰咽三过止。 此内观开明玉符，当以朱书白纸，投水中，东向叩齿三通，咒曰： 天无飞翳，地无游尘，玉符荡秽，洗除非真，洞明玄虚，招致灵仙。 毕，以水洗目漱口，吩内外，余符水悉放之东流。 紫书诀，出上清玉霞紫映内观经中篇。 修之八年，紫云覆兆身，目明彻视，洞观九天，体生奇光，纵景万变，飞行太空。 此道至妙，传已成真人，不行於世。 有金名玄图，绿字东华，得有此文，秘而奉修，真灵易感，招仙易成，道备炁盈，白日飞升。 慎勿轻传，以泄灵篇。 本生上旬之日者，甲子旬生，当以甲寅日为上旬，他皆如之。 紫书诀言：修上清玉霞紫映内观之道，常以月生一日，取西流水三升，盛以金器，铜器亦佳，以真朱一两，内着水中，名曰金精石景水母玉胎之瑛，露於中庭。 至月十五日正中，令日精流光玄映於石景水母，日象焕明水母之中。 东向书流霞开明洞观玉符，投内石景水母中，转南向，叩齿十六通，仰呼：日魂珠景胎韬绿映回霞赤童玄炎飙像，凡十六字。 毕，闭眼存日中五色流霞，下冠兆身，洞焕一形，存见日中有一仙人，形长八寸，头戴朱阳赤冠，衣绛锦丹裙，下在兆身头顶之上，口引日中赤丹金精石景水母之映，灌溉兆形，便临所盛水中瑛日光； 而微咒曰： 耀罗丹阳，元景敷陈，赤炉大明，九炁齐真，三五运精，二象交缠，玉胞石髓，炼故反新，流霞玄注，水母凝神，和魂柔魄，内外同烟，仰餐丹华，口啜日根，灵芝盈溢，面发金仙，与炁同躯，与日同存，乘景飞空，上造帝晨。 毕，仰向日十六咽止。 取石景水母之瑛，向日洗目，并沐浴形躯，余水放之西流。 行此九年，面有金容，内外洞彻，与日同光，飞行玄虚，上造日门。 此道高妙，不传下世，轻泄宝文，罚以鬼兵，身没鬼官，七祖获殃。 此流霞开明洞观玉符，东向朱书白纸上，叩齿十二通，咒曰： 太阳九道，八真齐明，三五回化，混合丹灵，石景玉胞，朱丹之精，采纳飞玄，来降我形，长与三晨，同死俱生。 毕，以符投於石景水母之中。 右上清玉霞紫映内观上法，一名金精石景水母玉胞经，一名采服日根招霞之道。 帝君常所宝秘，紫笔书文，紫金为简，封於太上九老仙都之房，琼宫玉室之内。 依科七百年一出，有金名玄图，绿字上清，得见此文，帝遣太阳金童十二人，侍卫己身。 修行九年，克得上仙，白日升天，游冥玉宫也。

*"Shangqing streaming rosy clouds, dawn of true auspiciousness,

Grasping clouds to summon the void, the numinous descends from the Purple Han,
Penetrating the obscure origin, the Three Mornings feast as one,
Roaming and ascending the Jade Hall, paying homage at the Emperor’s abode."*

Penetrating the mysterious void, summoning the numinous immortals."*

*"Radiant net of cinnabar yang, primordial radiance unfurled,
Crimson furnace of great brightness, the Nine Qi harmonize as one,
Three and Five refine the essence, the Two Images intertwine,
Jade embryo, stone marrow, refining the old to return to the new,
Streaming rosy clouds mystically infuse, the Water Mother congeals the spirit,
Harmonizing the hun, softening the po, inner and outer merge as mist,
Gaze upward to consume cinnabar blossoms, sip the sun’s root,
Spiritual mushrooms overflow, the face emits golden immortality,

Three and Five revolve and transform, merging with the cinnabar numen,
Stone Radiance Jade Embryo, essence of vermilion cinnabar,

chunks.original_text: 紫书诀言：修上清玉霞紫映内观之道，白日升玄之法，常以月生三日，取东井皇华之精三升，井华水也。 盛以金器之中，铜器亦佳，露着中庭。 至月十六日夜半，令月精光玄映於皇华丹景洞明皇华之中，兆东向，书黄炁阳精洞明灵符，投着皇华器中。 转西向，叩齿二十四通，仰呼曰：月魄暧箫芬艳翳寥婉虚灵兰郁华结翘渟金清营炅容台标，凡二十四字。 毕，闭眼存月中五色流精紫光，下冠兆身，洞匝一形，存月中有一真人，形长九寸，头戴紫冠，通身衣黄锦飞裙，下在兆头上，口引月中皇华，以灌激兆形，便临皇华器中映月光，而微咒曰： 灵舒耀华，三五洞清，紫黄交降，二炁混并，天元离合，运度亏盈，皇芝流溢，黄胎结精，景中真人，陶灌我形，月君夫人，固我黄宁，玉佩金铛，使我彻明，与月俱亏，与月俱生，长餐皇华，升入帝庭，浮游太空，匡御飞轮，上享无极，亿劫兆龄。 毕，仰向月二十四咽止，取皇华向月洗目，及通身自盥洗。 毕，余残悉放东流之水。 行此九年，目睹空洞，彻见万里，逆究吉凶，炼容易体，面有玉精，体生紫光，乘空驾虚，飞行上清。 此道高妙，不传下世，轻泄宝文，罚以神兵，身没幽泉，殃流万世，长充鬼官。 此黄炁阳精洞明灵符，东向，以黄笔书青纸上，叩齿十二通，咒曰： 阳藏阴生，二炁交周，天元混合，三五应符，服御皇华，灵降我躯，长享景炁，与神同休，落己九玄，参驾飞浮。 毕，以符放皇华之中。 右上清玉霞紫映内观上法，一名藏天隐月玉胎之经，一名八素真经服月皇华。 帝君常所宝秘，紫笔书文，紫金为简，封於太上九老仙都之房，琼宫玉室之内。 依科七百年一出，有金名玄图，绿字上清，得见此文，帝遣西华玉女十二人，侍卫兆身。 修行九年，克得上仙，白日升天，游造帝房也。 凡行此道，未至三日，皆沐浴兰香，清斋别房，不交人事，静思真灵，对景霄晨，至日行事，如睹帝颜，积感仿髴，克日化仙。 若天阴无日，亦可於室思而行之，道在精思，故感而致焉。 紫书诀言：修行上真之道，当以三月、九月、十二月三日、十五日、二十五日，一年三月，月三过行之。 此月是九天元父受化之月，日是游宴九天上宫值合之时也。 每至其日，沐浴清斋於隐寂之地，不关人事，向东北之上，仰天思九天元父姓名身长九寸九分，着玄黄素灵之绶，头戴七称朱玉之帻，无极进贤之冠，居九天之上，太极琼宫玉宝之府，丹灵乡洞元里中。 时乘碧霞飞舆，从十二飞龙、二十四仙人，匡鹄侍轮，游於虚玄之上。 存思分明，令如对颜，便九拜於元父，三过阴唤元父，甲今有言，乞与上升，奉侍帝灵。 叩齿九通，仰咒曰： 高上帝尊，元始大神，合真胤炁，形秀紫天，乘云驾浮，落景八烟，回轮曲降，道荫我身，得乘霄景，奉侍灵辕，今日八会，上愿开陈，所乞所启，莫不如言，长享元吉，与帝同存。 毕，仰咽九炁止。 如此元父感悦，帝尊欣喜，即命领仙注子金名。 九年精思，克遣琼舆，下迎子身，白日飞升，上造帝晨。 此道高妙，非下世凡学所可参闻。 自无金名玄图，绿字上清，莫得知见。 若於机会，遇得宝篇，皆宿挺合仙，但当宝录，密而奉行。

The Purple Writ’s Oral Instructions state: To cultivate the *Shangqing* Way of the Jade Radiance and Purple Reflection Inner Vision—the method of ascending to the Dark Mystery by daylight—one should, on the third day of the waxing moon, gather three *sheng* of the essence of the Eastern Well’s imperial blossom, which is the well’s first-drawn water. Store it in a golden vessel (a bronze vessel is also excellent) and expose it in the central courtyard. By the night of the sixteenth day of the moon, at midnight, let the moon’s essence and dark radiance reflect upon the imperial blossom’s cinnabar brilliance within the vessel. Face east, inscribe the *Yellow Qi* Yang Essence *Dongming* Numinous Talisman, and cast it into the imperial blossom vessel. Turn to the west, knock the teeth twenty-four times, and intone aloud:

*"Lunar orb, warm and fragrant, misty and graceful, empty and numinous, orchid-lush and blossom-twined, still as gold, pure as camp, fiery as the Terrace of Countenance’s standard."*

These are twenty-four characters in all. Upon completion, close the eyes and visualize the moon’s five-colored flowing essence and purple light descending to crown the body, enveloping it entirely. Within the moon, envision a perfected being, nine *cun* in height, wearing a purple coronet, clad in a yellow brocade flying skirt, standing above one’s head. This being draws the imperial blossom from the moon and pours it over the body. Then, facing the imperial blossom vessel and reflecting the moonlight, softly recite the incantation:

*"Numinous unfolding, radiant blossom,
Three and Five interpenetrate the pure,
Purple and yellow intertwine and descend,
Dual qi merge as one,
Celestial origin divides and unites,
Revolving through waxing and waning,
Imperial mushroom overflows,
Yellow embryo crystallizes essence,
Perfected within the radiance,
Mold and bathe my form,
Moon Sovereign and Lady,
Secure my yellow tranquility,
Jade pendants and golden bells,
Render me utterly luminous,
Wane with the moon,
Wax with the moon,
Ever feast on imperial blossoms,
Ascend to the Emperor’s court,
Float through the great void,
Pilot the flying wheel,
Supreme offering without end,
Eons of longevity."*

Upon completion, face the moon and swallow twenty-four times. Then, take the imperial blossom and, facing the moon, wash the eyes and bathe the entire body. Finally, release any remaining water into an eastward-flowing stream.

Practicing this for nine years, the eyes will perceive the empty and boundless, seeing clearly for ten thousand *li*, discerning fortune and misfortune in reverse. The countenance will be refined, the body transformed, the face suffused with jade essence, the form emanating purple light. One will ride the void, soar through the heavens, and ascend to the *Shangqing* realm.

This Way is lofty and wondrous, not to be transmitted to the lower world. Those who recklessly divulge its sacred writ will be punished by divine soldiers, their bodies consigned to the dark springs, their misfortune flowing through ten thousand generations, forever bound to the offices of ghosts.

This *Yellow Qi* Yang Essence *Dongming* Numinous Talisman is inscribed facing east, with a yellow brush on blue-green paper. Knock the teeth twelve times and recite the incantation:

*"Yang conceals, Yin arises,
Dual qi circulate and converge,
Celestial origin blends and unites,
Three and Five respond to the tally,
Ingest and command imperial blossoms,
Numinous descent into my frame,
Ever partake of radiant qi,
Abide with the spirits in repose,
Transcend the Nine Mysteries,
Join the flying chariot’s ascent."*

Upon completion, cast the talisman into the imperial blossom vessel.

This *Shangqing* method of the Jade Radiance and Purple Reflection Inner Vision is also called the *Scripture of Concealing Heaven and Hiding the Moon’s Jade Embryo* or the *Eight Simplicities Perfected Scripture of Ingesting the Moon’s Imperial Blossom*. The Lord Emperor treasures and guards it in secret, inscribing the text in purple ink on purple-gold slips, sealing it within the chambers of the Nine Elders of the Supreme Immortal Capital, in the Jade Palace of the Jeweled Abode. According to the regulations, it emerges once every seven hundred years. Those whose names are inscribed in the *Mysterious Chart of Golden Characters* with green script from the *Shangqing* tradition, having obtained this text, will be attended by twelve *Xihua* Jade Maidens sent by the Emperor. After nine years of practice, they will attain transcendence, ascending to heaven in broad daylight to roam the Emperor’s chambers.

In practicing this Way, for three days prior, one must bathe with orchid fragrance, maintain a pure fast in a separate chamber, avoid worldly affairs, and meditate upon the perfected and numinous. Facing the dawn’s radiance, proceed as if gazing upon the Emperor’s visage, accumulating resonance until the appointed day of transformation into an immortal. If the sky is overcast, one may also perform the practice indoors through visualization, for the Way lies in concentrated thought, and resonance will thus be achieved.

The Purple Writ’s Oral Instructions state: To cultivate the Way of the Supreme Perfected, one should practice on the third, fifteenth, and twenty-fifth days of the third, ninth, and twelfth lunar months—three months a year, three times each month. These months are when the Primordial Father of the Nine Heavens undergoes transformation, and these days are when he roams and feasts in the upper palaces of the Nine Heavens, aligning with the celestial tally.

On these days, bathe and fast in seclusion, avoiding worldly affairs. Face the northeast and visualize the Primordial Father of the Nine Heavens: his name, his height of nine *cun* and nine *fen*, his sash of dark yellow and plain numinous silk, his head adorned with a vermilion jade cap of seven measures, and the *Wuji* Advancing Worthies’ coronet. He resides above the Nine Heavens, in the Jade Treasure Palace of the Supreme Ultimate’s Jeweled Abode, within the Cinnabar Numinous Village and Cavern Origin Hamlet. At times, he rides a flying chariot of azure radiance, accompanied by twelve flying dragons and twenty-four immortals, with cranes flanking the wheels, roaming above the empty and mysterious.

Visualize him clearly, as if facing his countenance. Then, bow nine times to the Primordial Father and silently invoke him three times, saying: *"I, so-and-so, have a request: grant me ascent to serve the Emperor’s numen."* Knock the teeth nine times and intone the incantation:

*"Supreme Lord Emperor,
Primordial Great Spirit,
Conjoined with the true qi of lineage,
Form resplendent in the purple heavens,
Riding clouds and driving the floating,
Trailing radiance through the eight mists,
Turning the wheel in graceful descent,
Sheltering my body with the Way,
Grant me to ride the dawn’s radiance,
To serve the numinous axle.
Today at the Eight Assemblies,
I humbly present my supreme wish:
All I seek and petition,
May it be as spoken,
Ever partake of primal auspiciousness,
Abide with the Emperor in eternity."*

Upon completion, face upward and swallow nine times.

If the Primordial Father is moved and the Emperor pleased, they will command the recording of one’s name in the golden register of immortals. After nine years of concentrated practice, a jade chariot will be dispatched to welcome the body, ascending in broad daylight to the Emperor’s dawn.

This Way is lofty and wondrous, not to be shared with the lower world’s ordinary learners. Without one’s name inscribed in the *Mysterious Chart of Golden Characters* with green script from the *Shangqing* tradition, none may know or see it. If, by chance, one encounters this sacred text, it is because one is destined for transcendence. One should treasure and secretly practice it.

Attain the Celestial Perfected above.

Eight assemblies open,

Look up to the heavens and draw the sunlight into the mouth, inhaling and swallowing thirty-six breaths. When finished, return to face the mirror once more, then inhale and swallow the sun’s essence within the mirror forty-five times. Together, these make eighty-one breaths. This is the Dao of the Mysterious Within the Sun’s Radiance. Practicing it for three years, the pupil of the eye will emit flowing purple jade light, seeing clearly for ten thousand miles and perceiving all without limit. The face will glow like red cinnabar, the body will radiate a golden countenance, and when walking, one’s shadow will follow as if flying through the void. This is the supreme method of the Jade Emperor, transmitted to the Woman of Lu, who refined the essence to ascend to the Jade Court. This method is a precious secret; it must not be carelessly transmitted. If transmitted to the unworthy, calamity will extend to the seven generations of ancestors, and the body will be consigned to serve as a lowly ghost, never attaining immortality.

When cultivating the Dao of the Mysterious Within the Sun’s Radiance, if the sky is overcast and the sun is not visible, one may practice indoors, but the breaths swallowed should be doubled to one hundred sixty-two. The mirror must always be kept bright and free of dust or grime. It must not be carelessly allowed for others to gaze into, for this is a grave taboo. If three people have gazed into it, the Sun’s Radiance Child and the Red Essence Two Lords will descend in clouds, causing one to lose sight and spirit—beware of this.

This method was regularly practiced by the Queen Mother of the West, who transmitted it to the Azure Essentials Emperor Lord. The Azure Essentials Emperor Lord passed it to the Woman of Lu, and the Woman of Lu transmitted it to the Sun Woman. The Sun Woman constantly practiced it in the world, perceiving the mysterious void with clarity, her face radiating golden light. Though she lived for seven hundred years, in the era of harmonious balance, people thought her no older than seventeen or eighteen. She often rode a flying phoenix, traveling throughout the world, overseeing those of the Dao. Sometimes she descended with true qi to those with predestined affinity, or encountered them in visions to awaken them, allowing them to receive her true form and thus gain the ability to fly.

The Purple Book’s Oral Instructions state: On the days of conjunction at the new moon, when the qi of Heaven and Earth intermingle and the cycle completes, yin qi surges while yang essence wanes. At that hour, the heavens dispatch their forces, the ten thousand perfected descend to their thrones, the five stars shift their courses, and the ten heavens resonate as one. On such a day, when practicing the Dao of the Mysterious Within the Sun’s Radiance, one should go out into the central courtyard, face the sun with a bright mirror, and hold a great blade. Facing south, strike the teeth thirty-six times and recite the incantation while looking up:

*"Sun Radiance Child, yang light and red essence,
Radiant Net Perfected, jade spirit within the reflection,
Traversing the course borne by qi,
Above and below, all is solemn and clear.
Yin’s encroaching schemes
Invade the sun’s court.
Heaven dispatches its arms,
Imperial ministers lead the troops.
The Three and Five stand in rectitude,
Yang’s light shines through.
Heaven and Earth alternate in sustenance—
What merchant dares arise?
Return each to its place,
Let none diminish or overflow.
The Jade Emperor’s decree commands,
None dare disobey."*

When finished, inhale qi twenty-four times and stop. Thus, Heaven and Earth return to their positions, the Three and Five align in brilliance, the Child is moved to joy, the sun’s radiance returns its spirit, and flowing light mysteriously pours down, refining and descending into one’s body. One’s name will then be inscribed on the purple tablets and recorded in the Jade Clarity Register. Within nine years, one will ride a green chariot, soaring through the void to ascend to the Upper Clarity.

The Purple Book’s Oral Instructions state: On the day of a lunar eclipse, when yin qi wanes and yang qi waxes, the degrees of their courses intersect, and the two luminaries contend. This is when Heaven and Earth experience the separation and union of the sun and moon’s distinct qi. On the evening of a lunar eclipse, when the proper qi is encroached upon, the Five Stars, the Morning Department of the Imperial Bureaus, and the commands of the Great Yin marshal their forces to guard the spirit. On such an evening, go out into the central courtyard with a vat of clear water. Hold a blade, face the moon over the water, and strike the teeth sixteen times while reciting the incantation:

*"Heaven and Earth separate and unite,
Bearing qi, they exploit the waning.
Encroaching upon the moon’s abode,
They offend the yellow radiance.
Imperial ministers wield their staves,
The Jade Morning captures the transgressors.
Heavenly soldiers encircle the domain,
Divine lords unleash their might.
What merchant dares arise,
Riding shadows, exploiting the faint?
Swiftly return to your original place,
Let nothing transgress."*

Recite this three times while facing the moon, then stir the water in the vat three times with the blade in the right hand. Face the water and inhale, swallowing qi sixteen times. When finished, the lunar eclipse will dissolve, the celestial scene will be solemn and clear, the Three and Five will align in splendor, and the ten thousand palaces will be at peace. The Lady of the Moon’s True Person, her spirit radiant, will be moved to joy, returning her spirit’s mysterious reflection and descending her favor upon you. She will then report to the Northern Emperor, erasing your name from the register of the dead and inscribing it in the Jade Register of the Upper Clarity Palace. She will assign you twelve jade maidens to attend and guard your body. Practicing this for nine years, you will ride flying rosy clouds to ascend to the Moon Court. This method is most wondrous and not practiced in the world; those who receive it must treasure and keep it secret, never transmitting it lightly.

The Purple Book’s supreme method was practiced by the Emperor Lord, transmitted to Wang Lingzi, whose neck constantly emitted purple light, illuminating ten miles around. His eyes shone with flowing essence like stars, his face radiated a golden countenance, and at night, his empty brightness blazed. He commanded the Twelve Golden Lads of the Great Yang and the Twelve Jade Maidens of the Great Yin. This method is most secret and must not be lightly transmitted.

If the sky is overcast and the sun or moon is not visible, one may practice indoors, for even then, the hidden forces conspire to encroach—one cannot fail to rescue the proper luminaries.

The Purple Book’s Oral Instructions state: For those cultivating the Dao of the Upper Clarity who have not yet ascended to the Cloudy Court or soared in the Purple Void, even if one’s aspirations are set upon secluded mountains, maintaining long fasts in remote forests, one may still not escape the calamities of the *yang-nine* or the years of *cheng-tang*. The Precious True Jade Talisman for Deliverance from Calamity, bestowed by the Primordial Heavenly King, can guard against and traverse these disasters. This talisman existed with the Nine Heavens at the dawn of creation, enduring with the sun and moon. It passes through vast floods without sinking, treads through raging fires without burning, withstands sharp blades without injury, and grants longevity for ten thousand years before one’s life naturally ends. Wearing it for nine years, one’s form will transform, the body will generate wondrous light, and one will ride the void to ascend to the Jade Clarity.

chunks.original_text: 元始天王经 元始天王禀天自然之胤，结形未沌之霞，托体虚生之胎，生乎空洞之际。 时玄景未分，天光冥逮，浩漫太虚。 积七千余劫，天朗炁清，二辉缠络，玄云紫盖映其首，六气之电翼其真，夜生自明，神光烛室，散虚馥之烟，栖心霄霞之境，炼容洞彼之滨，独乘灵符之节，抗御玄降之章，内炁玄崖，僭想幽穷，忽焉逍遥，流盻忘旋，琼轮玉舆，碧辇玄龙，飞精流霭，耀电虚宫，东游碧水豪林之境，上憩青霞九曲之房，进登金阙，受号玉清紫虚高上元皇。 太上大道君金简玉札，使奏名东华方诸青宫，受命总统亿津，玄降玉华之女、金晨之童各三千人，飞龙毒兽，巨虬千寻，玃天奋爪，备卫玉关，天威焕赫，陈于广庭，飞青羽盖，流紫凤章，金真玉光，豁落七元，神虎上符，流金火铃，结编元皇，位登玉清，掌括上皇高帝之真，道备炁澄，仍赞灵篇三十九章，玉慧激词，演究无穷，妙音发於始天，玉响启於洞门，故号《能书#1大洞真经》。 其道极尊，与元始俱生，高上妙化，量难可胜，流音亿兆而不休，经万劫而方新，自无金简玉名，不得参闻。 后学之徒，懃志高尚，弃累忘尘，寂心长阜，对景霄晨，精斋苦念，倦不敢眠，奏金简玉札，记名玉清，然后得受《大洞真经口诀》，三元立到，发音骇动九天。 有得此章，上真之根次，有金简奏札，玉郎名参东华，便为真人，室招虚生之晖，堂降百和之烟，玉华侍侧，金晨卫形，洞鉴极天之崖，协三光以通真，运五晨以骋驾，策飞龙以御轮，上登三素之宫，拜谒太帝之前。 高上元皇之所禀，太上大道之极真，微乎元始灵化秘文，以付上相青童君，掌录东华，使传后圣应为真人者。 其道宝秘，不传下世，轻泄神文，身役幽源，殃及七玄，长充下鬼，万不得仙。 上相青童君曰：金简玉札，出自太上灵都之宫，刻玉为札，结金为简，书以朱文，编以紫绳，常以玄云紫盖荫其房，百和之香散其庭，使西华玉女、金晨之童各三百人，典卫灵文。 元始天王受於太，上大道君，其真、科七百年三传。 凡是学者，虽未得此文，其名皆已逆参青宫，但无金简玉字尔。 领仙侍郎、典录玉司，常以阴察精粗，其有勤尚苦志，皆令玄授此文，使奏名玉皇三元东华，太上当遣真人授其真经。 后圣众真，莫不先奏简於东华，投玉札於上清，然后得受《大洞真经》，精斋苦行，上为真人。 末学之徒，青宫无有金简之录，玉格无有玄编之名，神经亦不可得而授，彼天魔亦不可得而收，真灵终亦不降，玉女亦不卫子之身。 今故禀上皇之科，抄集品次，以为后学开津之径。 有心者宜加清斋，督志懃尚，注念玄真，感彻玉皇，奏简青宫，便得诵咏神经，通释幽玄，太上克遣丹舆飞軿，来迎兆身上登玉清。 然此经禁戒尤重，非真不传。 封金简玉札五岳上法#2 太上常以正月一日、七月七日、九月九日，一年三遣玉晨元皇、太极真人、领仙玉郎，诣东华青宫，校定真仙簿录。 其有金简玉名者，即言奏三元，随学深浅，玉童玉女防卫其身。 若有漏泄，轻真慢法，为玉童所奏，虽有金简，即被除移名鬼官，身被风刀之拷，七玄之祖运蒙山之石，填积夜之河。 凡积学之士，每以其日，当夷心寂室，清斋静念，散香左右，朱书金简八通，紫绳结篇，以奏高上玉皇、东华青宫；

The *Scripture of the Celestial Venerable of Primordial Beginning*

The Celestial Venerable of Primordial Beginning received the natural progeny of Heaven, coalescing form from the undifferentiated mists of chaos, entrusting his essence to the womb of emptiness, and emerging amid the boundless void. At that time, the dark radiance was yet undivided, the celestial light shrouded in obscurity, and the vast expanse of the Great Void stretched endlessly. Suddenly, he roamed freely, his gaze wandering without constraint. Jade wheels and jasper chariots, azure carriages and dark dragons—his flying essence trailed mist, his radiant lightning illuminated the void palace. He journeyed east to the realm of Azure Waters and Luxuriant Forests, ascending to rest in the Nine-Bend Chambers of Blue Dawn. The Most High Lord of the Great Dao presented a golden tablet and jade writ, commanding that his name be memorialized in the Azure Palace of the Eastern Florescence and Square Cauldron. Flying dragons and venomous beasts, colossal serpents a thousand fathoms long, and simians of the heavens brandished their claws, standing guard at the Jade Pass. Heavenly majesty blazed in the vast courtyard. Azure feathered canopies streamed with purple phoenix sigils, golden perfection and jade radiance blazed through the Seven Origins. Divine tigers bore the upper talismans, flowing gold and fire bells entwined the Primordial August Emperor. Ascending to the Jade Purity, he took charge of the true forms of the Supreme August High Emperor, his Dao perfected and qi clarified. He then expounded the thirty-nine numinous chapters, their jade wisdom flowing in boundless eloquence. Wondrous sounds issued from the Primordial Heaven, jade echoes resounded from the Cavernous Gates—thus was it named the *Numinous Scripture of the Great Cavern*.
